name: http_request
description: Send an HTTP request to a specified URL and return the response content, status code, and headers.

url.description: The full URL to send the request to, including scheme (e.g., https://).

method.description: The HTTP method to use. Default is GET.

headers.description: Optional HTTP headers to include in the request.

data.description: Optional request body for POST, PUT, or PATCH requests. Will be sent as JSON.

timeout.description: Timeout for the HTTP request in seconds. Default is 30.
